document.full_text: prosecutors rested their perjury case against baseball's home run king barry bonds on tuesday after a laboratory chief testified that a urine sample that bonds submitted tested positive for banned performance-enhancing drugs.
document.title: prosecutors rest perjury case against barry bonds
lines_and_colors: prosecutors rested their perjury case against baseball's home run king barry bonds on tuesday after a laboratory chief testified that a urine sample that bonds submitted tested positive for banned performance-enhancing drugs.
